summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3662 , for the improvement of 30th Avenue South, from Alaska Street to Angeline Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45139 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
